overview: After a long period working at the Lisbon Psychiatric Hospital Center, Sandro Resende and José Azevedo created the project "Manicómio" demonstrating that it is possible to demystify the stigma associated with mental illness, and that the artists who work there can be admired for the art they produce.  In 2021, Catarina Neves filmed the creation process of these artists, whose works are shown in exhibitions and enter the market like any other artistic object.
title: Ainda Não Acabei
